name: Twice Baked Potatoes
author: Sara Snider
instructions: Preheat oven 350Â°. Bake Potatoes for 1 hour or until done. Fry bacon in small pieces - set aside. Cut potatoes lengthwise. Scoopout potatoes, leaving 1/4 inch in skins. Mix potatoe pulp, sour cream, milk butter, salt & pepper with blender until smooth. Add cheese & bacon. Fill shells and bake 15 mins. Top w/ extra cheese & bacan
